description:
It is the year 2030, and the stage is the capital of Japan, Chou-Tokyo. Through "Buddyfight", humans have started cultural interactions with residents from other worlds called "Affinity Dimensions". Buddyfight is a game with selected humans as the "Buddyfighter", and residents from the other world as the partner (known as "Buddy Monster"). These battles have high significance and sometimes it is even used to decide the fate of a nation, and naturally there are those who seek to use the Buddy Monsters for evil purposes.
Source: crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
Gao must protect his new Buddy monster from Kyoya Gaen, who claims this newly-discovered monster could be a threat. Kyoya challenges Gao to a Buddyfight, giving him less than a day to unlock the secrets of the Sun Dragons and the new Impact Monsters.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Uh-oh! An Impact Monster Is Born!
Yabee! Hissatsu Monster Tanjou!
ヤベェ! 必殺モンスター誕生!!

REGULAR.description:
Bal is eager to play Buddyfight, but is frustrated when everyone points out that he`s not playing by the rules. Jackknife Dragon offers to teach him a sure-fire way to win without getting complaints. Meanwhile, Tasuku transfers to Aibo Academy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Amazing! A Sure-fire Way to Win Buddyfight!
Sugee! Zettai Kateru Buddyfight Hisshouhou!!
スゲェ! 絶対勝てるバディファイト必勝法!!

REGULAR.description:
When Gao forgets an important promise, Bal quits being his Buddy Monster. A mysterious dragon named Abygale takes the runaway Bal under his wing, but Gao suspects that Abygale`s buddy Gaito has been challenging kids to Buddyfight and taking their cards.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kowaa! Gaito no Hissatsu Monster!!
Scary! Gaito`s Impact Monster!
コワァ! ガイトの必殺モンスター!!

REGULAR.description:
Bal is given special permission to attend classes. A jealous student tries to get him in trouble by framing him for a crime. Jack and Tasuku work together to clear Bal`s name... by challenging the villain to a Buddyfight!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cool! Jack`s Impact Monster!
Kakkee! Jack no Hissatsu Monster!!
カッケェ! ジャックの必殺モンスター!!

REGULAR.description:
Bal looks for a coach to help him train hard for the WBC Cup. Tetsuya`s Buddy Demon Lord Asmodai takes Bal under his wing and challenges him physically and mentally, culminating in a Buddyfight with Bal and Gao`s partnership at stake.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hidee! Akuma no Coach Asmodai!!
So Mean! Demon Coach Asmodai!
ヒデェ! 悪魔のコーチ・アスモダイ!!

REGULAR.description:
Gao and his friends try to help a mysterious cat find Gaito. Their search leads them to a Buddyfight between Gaito and Kyoya Gaen. Azi Dahaka and Abygale`s past is revealed, as Kyoya goads Gaito into showing him the power of his Impact Monster.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Impressive! Abygale Versus Azi Dahaka!
Panee! Abigail VS Azi Dahaka!!
パネェ! アビゲールVSアジ・ダハーカ!!

REGULAR.description:
The WBC Cup begins, and Gao and his rivals fight to become the Best 8 of Cho-Tokyo. Bal becomes convinced that the only way to win is to increase one`s luck. As Noboru battles Gaito, he`s forced to face some hard truths about destiny and luck.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s Here! WBC Cup Cho-Tokyo Championship!
Kitaa! WBC Cup Choutoukyou Taikai!!
キタァー! WBCカップ超東驚大会!!

REGULAR.description:
Maska Raid and his Buddy, Blazer Frill, plot to win their match against Tasuku through any means necessary. After a series of mishaps, Blazer Frill convinces Bal to help her win. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Moemoee! Ai to Seigi no Seifuku Senshi Blazer Frill!!
So Lovely! Uniform Warrior of Love and Courage, Blazer Frill!
モエモエーッ! 愛と正義の制服戦士ブレザーフリル!!

REGULAR.description:
As part of a revenge plot against Tasuku, Wataru sends his Buddy to steal Gaito`s Impact Monster card. Bal blames himself and races against the clock to retrieve the card before Wataru and Gaito`s Buddyfight begins.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nani! Ubawareta Hissatsu Monster!!
What? The Stolen Impact Monster!
ナニィ! 奪われた必殺モンスター!!

REGULAR.description:
Dash Kazakiri is Gao`s next opponent...and his biggest fan! When Gao comes down with an incurable illness, Dash takes him to a doctor from Magic World. Gao`s sickness gets progressively worse, but he is determined to show Dash the best Buddyfight ever.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gyogyo! Sonna Masaka na Dai Pinch!!
Yikes! An Unexpected Fishy Disaster!
ギョギョ! そんなマサカな大ピンチ!!

REGULAR.description:
Gao is desperate to see Genma and Dai`s Buddyfight in person and sneaks out to see the match, despite Dr. Buer ordering him to stay in bed. It`s a literal clash of the titans as Genma and Dai compete to determine who is the strongest fighter.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dekee! Banchou Daikettou!!
So Huge! Mighty Fighter Showdown!
デケェ! 番長大決闘!!

REGULAR.description:
Gao struggles to understand Gaito`s attitude towards Buddyfight. In their semi-final match, Gao and Gaito pit their Impact Monsters against each other. Can Gao befriend this fearsome opponent?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Damedaa! Bal Burst Smasher!?
It`s Not Working! Bal Burst Smasher?!
ダメダァ! バルバースト・スマッシャー!?

REGULAR.description:
Tasuku and Dai Kaido face off in the second fight of the semi-finals. The story of how Dai met his Buddy is revealed, and Jack`s Impact Monster meets its match in Duel Jaeger`s evolved form.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Deta! Muteki Ryuu "Ribol Ted"!!
It`s Here! Duel Jaeger
デタァ! 無敵竜 "リボルテッド"!!

REGULAR.description:
Gao prepares for the final fight against Dai by reworking his deck, while Bal asks Genma Todoroki for advice on how to beat Dai`s colossal Buddy, Duel Jaeger. Tensions mount as Gao and Dai face off in the final match!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hooray! Cho-Tokyo Championship Final Festival!
Wasshoi! Chou Higashi Odoroki Taikai Kesshou Matsuri!!
ワッショイ! 超東驚大会決勝祭り!!

REGULAR.description:
Gao and Dai`s battle continues. Genma reveals the true nature of Bal and Gao`s intensive training, as Gao pits his new Impact Monster against the seemingly invincible Duel Jaeger.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Orya! Great Full Bal Lariat!!
Pow! Great Full Bal Lariat!
オリャア! グレイトフル・バルラリアット!!

REGULAR.description:
Zanya gives his little brother Akatsuki his Buddyfight deck, making him fear that Zanya is retiring to focus on his kendo training...or a mysterious new girlfriend. When Blazer Frill`s latest plot is foiled, she challenges Zanya to a Buddyfight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shock! Zanya Intai Sengen!!
Shock! Zanya`s Retirement Declaration!
ショック! 斬夜引退宣言!!

REGULAR.description:
As the winners of the Cho-Tokyo Championship head to the Japan Tournament, they take a look back at their adventures so far. Their destination holds many secrets, including the mysterious Dragon Force and a new enemy, Doctor Gara.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Full Steam Ahead! To The Japan Representative Invitational Island!
Yousorou! Nihon Daihyou Senbatsu no Shima e!!
ヨーソロォ! 日本代表選抜の島へ!!

REGULAR.description:
The Japan Tournament begins. The Buddyfighters compete to be the first to reach 100 wins and qualify for the World Championship. Meanwhile, Tasuku fights to protect Bal and uncover Doctor Gara`s plans.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Here it Comes! WBC Cup Japan Tournament!
Kita Kitaaa! WBC Cup Nihon Taikai!!
キタキタァー! WBCカップ日本大会!!

REGULAR.description:
Tasuku digs deeper into the mystery of Doctor Gara. Gao and Bal encounter a medical student named Kaeru, who has the same Buddy monster as Gara. Kakeru helps treat Ozon B`s sickness and challenges Gao to a Buddyfight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Here it Comes Again! Terrifying Natural Enemy, Zodiac!
Matadata! Kyoufu no Tenteki Zodiac!!
マタデタァ! 恐怖の天敵ゾディアック!!

REGULAR.description:
Rouga and Cerberus save Bal from Doctor Gara`s latest attack. Bal gives Cerberus an Impact Monster card as thanks, and Rouga uses it to fight Dai. Gao is eager to face his former upperclassman in a Buddyfight, but Rouga has more than victory on his mind.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Danger! The Wolf Makes its Move!
Danger! Ugokidashita Ookami!!
デンジャー! 動き出した狼!!

REGULAR.description:
Gaito`s quest to find the ultimate dragon power leads him to a mysterious old woman. She agrees to tell him about the Dragon Force, but only if he defeats her grandson, Tenka Gotsurugi. Tenka accidentally challenges Gao instead.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Grandmother! Enter Tenka Gotsurugi!
Obaba! Gotsurugi Sanjou!!
オババッ! 五剣天下参上!!

REGULAR.description:
Baku and Kuguru convince Gao that he should focus on winning Buddyfights while they look for the missing Bal. Rouga and Cerberus lend a hand, while Bal fights for his life against Doctor Gara.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Uwa! Bakuhatsu 0 Byou Mae!!
Yikes! 0 Seconds to Detonation!
ウワッ! 爆発0秒前!!

REGULAR.description:
Tasuku rushes to help Gao search for Bal, but is interrupted by the attention-hungry Ageha Gokuraku, whose Divine Guardians deck proves to be a great challenge.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bal! Fire, Galactical Punisher!
Baruu! Hanate, Galactical Punisher!!
バルゥ! 放て, ギャラクティカル・パニッシャー!!

REGULAR.description:
Tasuku continues to search for Bal, while Gao works on reaching 100 wins. Gaito is challenged by a mysterious fighter with a grudge, and a deadly Searing Executioners deck tailor-made to destroy him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Achii! Shukumei no Shakunetsu Jigoku!!
Hot! Searing Executioners of Destiny!
アチィッ! 宿命の灼熱地獄!!

REGULAR.description:
An anonymous tip leads Tasuku and Gao to Doctor Gara`s lair. Gao and Bal are reunited, but are told that they must withdraw from the tournament unless they can prove that Bal is healthy enough to fight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Suggee! Bal Saucer Over Rush!!
Wow! Bal Saucer Over Rush!
スッゲェ! バルソーサー・オーバーラッシュ!!

REGULAR.description:
On the final day of the Japan Tournament, the remaining Buddyfighters race to be the first to reach 100 wins. As Gao closes the distance between himself and top fighter Dai Kaido, Doctor Gara puts his plan into motion.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Go Go! Bal, Dotou no Kaishingeki!!
Go, Go! Bal`s Surging Steady Advance!
ゴーゴー! バル, 怒涛の快進撃!!

REGULAR.description:
Gao tries to help Bal regain his senses while also battling Doctor Gara. Doctor Gara reveals that he can block Final Phase as well as Impact Monsters. As Gao reminds Bal of their promise to become Buddy Champions, he unlocks a new power within himself.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gao! This is the Dragon Force!
Gaoo! Kore ga Dragon Force Da!!
ガオオォ! これがドラゴンフォースだ!!

REGULAR.description:
Gao and friends head to Los Angeles for the WBC Cup World Championships! Kyoya makes a surprise appearance as a competitor, as does the mysterious J Genesis. In the first match of the first round, Kyoya unfurls his new flag: the powerful Dragon Zwei.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Here it Comes x3! WBC Cup World Championships!
Kita Kita Kitaaa! WBC Cup Sekai Taikai!!
キタキタキタァー! WBCカップ世界大会!!

REGULAR.description:
Jack is accused of attacking a WBC Cup competitor. The punishment for his crime: exile. Gao and Bal look for proof of Jack`s innocence while Jack and Tasuku face off against Grim Reaper of Siberia`s traps!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Scary Trap! Jackknife, Arrested!
Wanawana! Taihosareta Jackknife!!
ワナワナ! 逮捕されたジャックナイフ!!

REGULAR.description:
When Gao and Bal`s next opponent mocks them, Bal is determined to bulk up through training. On the day of the match, Devil Destroy Bigmachine falls in love with Noboru and challenges Gao for his hand in marriage.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Wedding! Man Mountain Range, Devil Destroy!
Wedding! Ningen Sanmyaku Devil Destroy!!
ウェディング! 人間山脈デビル・デストロイ!!

REGULAR.description:
Abygale asks Gao and Tasuku for advice to help Gaito unlock the power of the Dragon Force. Meanwhile, J Genesis plots to crush Gaito in order to sabotage Kyoya`s plans.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Zeta! Kyougaku no Kikou Senki!!
Zetta! Shocking Armored Battle Demon!
ゼータ! 驚愕の機甲戦鬼!!

REGULAR.description:
Amigo Takata is forced to concede defeat when his cards go missing. Gao faces a mysterious new opponent and uncovers a previously unknown Buddyfight community.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Meow Meow! Meow meow, meow meow!
Nyanyanya! Nyanyanyanya!!
ニャニャニャ! にゃにゃにゃにゃ!!

REGULAR.description:
As the Buddy Police work to uncover J Genesis`s secrets, Tasuku sends Jack on a secret mission. The true nature of J Genesis` buddy Gemclone is revealed during the quarterfinals match.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: For Real? Fake Replica Weapon, Gemclone!
Maji!? Jinzou Mohou Heiki Gemclone!!
マジッ!? 人造模倣兵器 ジェムクローン!!

REGULAR.description:
Noboru must defeat Kyoya in the semifinals if he wants to face Gao in the finals. He looks back at the path that has led him here, and struggles to choose between his pride and the promise he made to Gao.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Revenge! The Tiger Roars Twice!
Revenge! Tora wa Nido Hoeru!!
リベンジィ! 虎は二度吠える!!

REGULAR.description:
Gao and Tasuku help Gaito look for his missing buddy, Abygale. Meanwhile, J Genesis and Devil Destroy Bigmachine plot to keep the two apart. Gaito attempts to deal with a traumatic incident from his past.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Last Fight! Farewell, Abygale!
Last Fight! Saraba, Abygale!!
ラストファイト! さらば, アビゲール!!

REGULAR.description:
As Gao and his friends celebrate Gaito and Abygale`s reunion, J Genesis unveils his Impact Monster`s new form on live TV. Baku suffers a crisis of confidence. Bal makes contact with a mysterious entity who may hold the keys to J Genesis`s plans.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gachiyaba! Hissatsu no Origin Breaker!!
Serious Trouble! Impact Origin Breaker!
ガチヤバ! 必殺のオリジン・ブレイカー!!

REGULAR.description:
Gao and Bal do their best to defeat J Genesis, in hopes of preventing him from selling Origin Breaker to the highest bidder as an instrument of war. Gao, Tasuku, and Gaito`s strong awaken an unknown power within Bal!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gachisugo! Chou Taiyou Ryuu Balle Soleil!!
Ultra-Amazing! Super Sun Dragon, Balle Soleil!
ガチスゴ! 超太陽竜バルソレイユ!!

REGULAR.description:
Gaito reveals the truth about Balle Soleil and the Dragon Force. While Gao and his friends search for the missing Bal, Gaito and Abygale have a final showdown with Kyoya and Azi Dahaka.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Oyajii! Azi Dahaka no Saigo!!
Pops! Azi Dahaka`s End!
オヤジッ! アジ・ダハーカの最期!!

REGULAR.description:
Azi Dahaka achieves his final evolution form and flies off in search of his nemesis, Balle Soleil. He encounters Chief of the Sea, Dai Kaido, who tries to protect Gao and Bal by challenging Kyoya and Azi Dahaka to a Buddyfight
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Endless! Black Sky Sun Dragon, Azi Dahaka "Daeva"!
Endless! Kuroten Taiyou Ryuu Azi Dahaka "Da Eva"!!
エンドレス! 黒天太陽竜アジ・ダハーカ"ダ・エーワ"!!

REGULAR.description:
Gao Mikado and Kyoya Gaen face each other in the final. With a deck of cards expertly prepared by Baku, Gao makes a strong start as Kyoya is pushed into a corner. But then the tables are turned as the ominous specter of Azi Dahaka envelops the stadium.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Finally! WBC Cup Sekai Taikai Kesshou!!
Finally! WBC Cup World Championships Final Match!
ファイナル! WBCカップ世界大会決勝!!

REGULAR.description:
Gao Mikado and Kyoya Gaen are in the throes of battle! Noboru and the others search for
an old card that Baku says Gao needs in his fight against Kyoya. Pushed to the brink, Gao casts Dragonic Force, a big gamble that could bring great harm to himself!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dohyaa! Chou Taiyou Ryuu vs Kuroten Taiyou Ryuu!!
Whoa! Super Sun Dragon Vs. Black Sky Sun Dragon!
ドヒャァー! 超太陽竜VS黒天太陽竜!!

REGULAR.description:
Kiri returns from Dungeon World, hoping to prevent the creation of Dragon Drei. Before he has a chance to put his plan into action, Gao invites Kiri to a friendly Buddyfight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Majikaa! Bougyo Ryoku 20000 no Kyoui!!
Seriously?! A Threatening 20000 Defense!
マジカッ! 防御力20000の驚異!!

REGULAR.description:
Gao and Bal are ready to train, but first they have to deal with homework. Gaito and Abygale want to confront Kyoya, but Tasuku and Jack argue that they should leave it to the Buddy Police. A Buddyfight ensues.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Colliding Forces! Tasuku Ryuenji vs. Gaito Kurouzu?!
Gekitotsu! Ryuuenji vs Kurouzu Gaito!?
ゲキトツ! 龍炎寺タスクVS黒渦ガイト!?

REGULAR.description:
Gao struggles to balance his homework with his preparations for the Buddy Champion Deciding Round. Tasuku faces off against Doctor Gara in the hopes of evolving his Dragon Force.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Revenge! Doctor Gara Strikes Back!
Revenge! Doctor Gara no Fukushuu!!
リベンジィ! ドクター・ガラの復讐!!

REGULAR.description:
In order to enter Gaen Tower, Gaito must battle J Genesis. J Genesis` Buddy, Origin Breaker, begs Gaito and Abygale to save his father. Gao continues to struggle with his homework.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Majiachi! Gemclone no Kokoro!
Seriously Hot! Gemclone`s Heart!
マジアチィッ! ジェムクローンの心!!

REGULAR.description:
Kyoya orders Wolf to challenge Gao to a Buddyfight. Gao tries to uncover the truth behind why Rouga Aragami abandoned his name and went back to doing Kyoya`s bidding.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Good Luck! Wolf Saigo no Fight!!
Good luck! Wolf`s Final Fight!
グッドラック! ウルフ最期のファイト!!

REGULAR.description:
The world looks on as Paruko delivers a live broadcast of a historic battle. Kyoya challenges Tasuku and Gaito to a two-on-one Buddyfight, with the newly-completed Dragon Drei card as the stakes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gachi Shock! Dragon Drei Kyoui no Chikara!!
Massive Shock! Dragon Drei`s Amazing Power!
ガチショック! ドラゴン・ドライ驚異の力!!

REGULAR.description:
Gao trains hard with Tasuku and Gaito in preparation for the Buddy Champion Deciding Round, while Baku, Kuguru and Noboru work on strategy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Secret! Project DDD no Zenbou!!
Secret! The True Nature of Project Triple D!
シークレット! プロジェクトDDDの全貌!!

REGULAR.description:
Gao and Bal head to Los Angeles to face Kyoya Gaen in the deciding round of the WBC Cup. Kyoya reveals his secret agenda to change the world using his new Dragon Drei card.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Figh! Buddy Champion Ketteisen!!
Fight! Buddy Champion Deciding Round!
ファイッ! バディチャンピオン決定戦!!

REGULAR.description:
Dragons all over the world begin to suffer as Kyoya puts his plan into motion. Gao`s friends attempt to control the chaos, while Gao and Bal face off against Kyoya in a final battle for the future.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Climax! Eternal Bal Blaster!
Climax! Hanate, Eternal Bal Blaster!!
クライマックス! 放て, エターナル・バルブラスター!!

REGULAR.description:
As Tasuku and Gao explore the history of Bal`s battles with Azi Dahaka, Bal has visions of the future. Gao`s friends organize a victory celebration that quickly becomes a Buddyfight tournament.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bye-bye! Eternal Farewell to Bal!
Byebye! Bal, Eien no Wakare!!
バイバイ! バル, 永遠の別れ!!
Opening
Ending
Future Card Buddyfight DDD
フューチャーカード バディファイトDDD
未来卡搭档对战DDD
